name: Quiver
testmsg: Hey there, this is a test message that I just pulled from the locale JSON!
fatalErrorEmbedDescription: Well, it seems like something isn't quite right.
prefixSetEmbedDescription:
All future commands will use this prefix.
`Ex. {prefix}set locale`
prefixUsage: `{prefix}set prefix [prefix]` Set a new prefix for the server.
setUsage:
`{prefix}set prefix [prefix]` Set a new prefix for the server.
`{prefix}set locale [locale code]` Change the language of all commands/messages.
